title: IGNITE-19030 Platforms: Add authorization of Compute tasks
body:
Added authorization of tasks/closures/callables/runnables that are executed via Compute API in CPP and DotNet platforms implementation. 

DotNet: The FQN of the executable class is used as the task name for authorization.
CPP: The name of the binary class type corresponding to the computed executable is used as the task name for authorization.

title: IGNITE-17345 [IEP-35] Metric to track PA enabled request on ThinClient
body:
AH - Awarsness Hit
AM - Awarsness Miss
PA - Partition awareness

AH/AM metrics are calculated regardless of whether PA is enabled on the thin client.
If PA is disabled on the thin client, then the AM metric will not be zero - it will grow.
If PA is enabled, then the value of the AM metric should be equal to zero, and AH metric should constantly increase.
For single key cahe operations AH grow then operation not in transaction.
For ScanQuery/IndexQuery AH grow regardless of whether they are running in a transaction or not, for every key in result, when PA enables on client.
